name: GraphicsContext.ShadowOptions
desc: Options that configure the graphics context filter that creates shadows.

items.name: static var disablesGroup: GraphicsContext.ShadowOptions
items.desc: An option that causes the filter to composite the object and its shadow separately in the current layer.

items.name: static var invertsAlpha: GraphicsContext.ShadowOptions
items.desc: An option that causes the filter to invert the alpha of the shadow.

items.name: static var shadowAbove: GraphicsContext.ShadowOptions
items.desc: An option that causes the filter to draw the shadow above the object, rather than below it.

items.name: static var shadowOnly: GraphicsContext.ShadowOptions
items.desc: An option that causes the filter to draw only the shadow, and omit the source object.

items.name: init(rawValue: UInt32)
items.desc: Creates a new option set from the given raw value.

items.name: let rawValue: UInt32
items.desc: The corresponding value of the raw type.

items.name: typealias RawValue
items.desc: The raw type that can be used to represent all values of the conforming type.

items.name: typealias Element
items.desc: The element type of the option set.

items.name: typealias ArrayLiteralElement
items.desc: The type of the elements of an array literal.
